attributes.action: change age of driving to 15/16 rather than 18
attributes.background: Many 16-year-olds are restricted on what they can do, as they are unable to drive places, and some people live in areas where there are no buses or public transport, and all rely on parents or carers to take them places.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reduce age limit for holding a full driving licence to 16 with restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733742
